sentence: Pictures were deceiving of lobby and pool
The pool is about the size of the smaller rooms
Disappointing pool disappointing room barely any amenities for high price on Saturdays nowhere to really mingle AC leaked windows did not open well bad bleach smell
By the way the Clintons pool does not look like it does in their pictures
Swimming pool is around 12 feet X 5 feet maximum depth 4 feet
I did not like the fact that my view was covered by a tarp when I exited my room and my balcony view was one of a dirty shallow wading pool that had nasty water in it and cigarette butts
The pool is disgusting and small
Lousy Swimming pool under construction which of course they say nothing about during the reservation process
However the actual size of the pool could probably be compared to a very large jacuzi
Pool area is worn out some of the water features do not contain water
The picture is well taken for the pool because a duck will not use it and be comfortable
Especially Radha from front desk and Mara from the The swimming pool could be bigger but the hotel is just 2 min walking to the beach
The pool was so tiny I almost missed it the only thing nice about this hotel was the bed and the location
The pool was small but adequate as the beach was within easy walking distance
pool looks nice in thepic but it is really small breakfast only toasts sliced bread bagels etc
Swimming pool toilet and facilities

honestly not that great smallest pool i ve ever seen some of the sheets they gave us had holes in them and housekeeping kept taking our wash clothes and not replacing them the minibar they try to scam you with takes up half your space just very espensive for what you get only good thing is convenient and very good location
Good value hotel but do not be confused by picture pool is tiny but ocean is two blocks away
Love it will come back again but need to get a bigger pool
Pool is too small useless and not clean
When I said something they then changed the mind and said “ you can get in the pool at 530 “ I ’m guessing once the pool was cleared out
They told me the pool was closed and when I went too take a look for myself the pool was open and their were plenty of people there skin complexion in the pool
They claim that it covers a “ pool ” when what they have is a glorified bathtub outside
Rooms small room service terrible extremely small pool charged resort fee without any resort privileges
Swimming pool is a joke
